solution_line_template: Since there are {months_jan_jul} months from January to July, then Roe's savings for those months sum up to ${savings_jan_jul_per_month} x {months_jan_jul} = $<<{months_jan_jul}*{savings_jan_jul_per_month}={savings_jan_jul_total}>>{savings_jan_jul_total}.

Since there are {months_aug_nov} months from August to November, then her savings for those months sum up to ${savings_aug_nov_per_month} x {months_aug_nov} = $<<{months_aug_nov}*{savings_aug_nov_per_month}={savings_aug_nov_total}>>{savings_aug_nov_total}.

Her total savings from January to November is ${savings_jan_jul_total} + ${savings_aug_nov_total} = $<<{savings_jan_jul_total}+{savings_aug_nov_total}={savings_jan_nov_total}>>{savings_jan_nov_total}.
Therefore, she needs to save ${target_total_savings} - ${savings_jan_nov_total} = $<<{target_total_savings}-{savings_jan_nov_total}={savings_december}>>{savings_december} in December.
